Title: Celestial Abstractions: Paintings by Benjamin Schmitt
Location: Priscilla Fowler Fine Art Gallery/Studio 1025 S. First StSuite 155 Las Vegas, NV 89101
Description: Priscilla Fowler Fine Art Gallery and Studio Presents Celestial Abstractions: Paintings by Benjamin SchmittThe beautiful, the distorted, the deep layers of life. Benjamin Schmitt has a unique way of showing us nature’s rhythms that lie beneath the surface. This takes us on an emotional journey of the abstract and organized chaos that, when combined, is timeless and relevant. This is accomplished through mapping the intelligence of the human experience focusing on the dichotomy between the seen and unseen. Come experience these colorful abstractions in person. Celestial Abstraction: Paintings will be displayed through January 27, 2018. Meet Benjamin Schmitt on Preview Thursday, November 30, from 5-9 p.m.and First Friday, December 1, from 5-11 p.m. Priscilla Fowler Fine Art Gallery is conveniently located at 1025 S. 1st Street in the downtown Las Vegas Arts District and is open Wednesday-Saturday, 12-9 p.m., or by appointment.

Title: Holiday Group Hang
Location: Priscilla Fowler Fine Art Gallery/Studio 1025 S. First StSuite 155 Las Vegas, NV 89101
Description: Priscilla Fowler Fine Art Gallery and Studio PresentsHoliday Group Hang!Please join us for a very merry show featuring generous holiday pricing on original artwork. We are featuring both local and national return artists, as well as newcomers to our gallery for this special event. Artists include: Alexander Lui, Tom Umholtz, Jeff Fulmer, Jeanne Voltura, Rosanne Giacomini, Priscilla Fowler, Eva Celin, 3 Baaad Sheep, Donald Starr, Diane Bush, Shirley Davis, Jamel Mohamed, Julia(n) Grey, and Kristin Meuse. Also Terrien Hale, Brigitte Begley, Allison Streater, Joanna Michalowicz, and many others! Give the gift of artwork to your friends, family, and even yourself this holiday season. Local artist, Benjamin Schmitt will also be displaying his solo show, Celestial Abstractions: Paintings at the front of the gallery. Don't miss it! Paintings will be displayed through January 27, 2018. Meet many of the artists on Preview Thursday, November 30, from 5-9 p.m.and First Friday, December 1, from 5-11 p.m. Priscilla Fowler Fine Art Gallery is located at 1025 S. 1st St in the downtown Las Vegas Arts District. Special holiday pricing for the group show will continue through January 27, 2018. Regular hours are Wednesday-Saturday, 12-9 p.m., or by appointment.

Title: Downtown Summerlin Holiday Train Rides
Location: Downtown Summerlin 1980 Festival Plaza Dr Las Vegas, NV 89135
Description: Rides are $4.00 per child. Adults are required to purchase tickets and ride with their kids. Tickets are purchased at the train directly on The Lawn.

Title: Rock Rink in Downtown Summerlin
Location: Downtown Summerlin 1980 Festival Plaza Dr Las Vegas, NV 89135
Description: Rock Rink, the premier ice skating rink located near the Pavilion on The Lawn. Highlights include skating under the stars set to the backdrop of joyful holiday music and an impressive 40-foot holiday tree overlooking the rink.  Skate rentals start at $15, and all ages are welcome.  Coffee Bean & Tea Leaf will offer signature holiday beverages via a mobile coffee truck rink-side

Title: Bird Road Podcast LIVE
Location: ReBAR 1225 S Main St Las Vegas, NV 89104
Description: Bird Road Podcast Presents the Bird Road Cavalcade of Stars!Progressive Politics, Presented Pleasantly.This will be the first ever LIVE episode of our Bird Road Podcast featuring your hosts, David Michael Quinones (Q) & David Rosen (Jewish Dave), as well as growing list of guests that currently includes:- Gubernatorial Candidate and Rights Society Co-Founder Kyle Chamberlain- Comedian Jason Harris- Thee Swank Bastards- Dead Money- Joseph S. MascolinoAND MORE!There will be jokes, jams and you might even learn something. Or you'll just drink a lot of beer and have a great time at ReBAR, because ReBAR rules. Plus when's the last time you hung out with Q & Jewish Dave? I mean, really!If you haven't already, listen, rate and review Bird Road Podcast on iTunes, Google Play or anywhere you listen to podcasts! Check out our website at http://www.birdroadpodcast.com/ for all the links you need.21+, FREE

Description: Partial to peacocks and paisley? Looking for a special piece of artwork for your home? This 10" x 30" painting may be your answer.

Title: Holiday Blessings-Sacred Native American Pipe Ceremony
Location: Enchanted Forest Reiki Center, Spiritual Items 'n More 2280 S Jones Blvd Las Vegas, NV 89146
Description: 7:00p.m. Tobacco And/or Love DonationThis is an authentic ritual Pipe Ceremony and healing circle.We encourage you to bring your children, family and friends to this special family event.A ceremony where kids can be themselves. Crying is allowed.This is an ideal time to bring items such as crystals, necklaces, drums, rattles to be cleansed, energized, and blessed.For those requesting for a more personal healing, blessing, or guidance, it is traditional for the Shaman to be given tobacco as a gift for their sacrifice and offering. Pipe tobacco is perfect.The ceremony will involve storytelling, a talking circle, drumming, meditation, and chanting of sacred songs and songs from the heart.Ladies cannot be on their "power time", but are welcome to attend another ceremony. If you are not aware what is considered to be "power time" in Native American tradition please contact Debbie through Enchanted Forest at 702-948-4999 for clarification. ( If possible, bring 4 colored ribbons of your choice, length from heart to the end of your fingertip.)This is a spiritual circle, we invite your loving universal energies into the space whether you are a healer of another energy modality or are someone whom is completely unfamiliar with Shaman ceremony or spiriual healing. All are welcome.

If you want the real deal performed by seasoned professionals check it out. Waylon, Willie, Hank, Cash, Jones, Haggard, and...well you get the idea.  The popular DJ Kaz will be spinning all your favorite line dance and modern country hits on the band breaks.Bobby Kingston Band Live 7pm-12amTeddy & Brenda's Dance Lesson Music 8-830pmDJ Kaz on band breaks & closes out show 9:30pm-2amCome and party with us at Las Vegas' LAST Remaining REAL Honky Tonk Bar! Location: Zumanity Theater 3790 South Las Vegas Boulevard Las Vegas, NV 89109
Description: Born May 3, 1934 in Newark, New Jersey.Frankie Valli is best known as lead singer of The Four Seasons, one of the biggest music acts of the 1960s, which continued from then to the 1970s disco scene to the present day.

Title: John Fogerty Performs Songs from Creedence Clearwater Revival
Location: Encore at Wynn Las Vegas 3131 S Las Vegas Blvd Las Vegas, NV 89109
Description: Celebrating American rock with what will inevitably prove to be an unforgettable engagement, John Fogerty performs his songs from Creedence Clearwater Revival in the intimate Encore Theater. The music legend and member of the Rock and Roll Hall of Fame will return to Wynn from September 20 through October 7, and again from January 10 through 20. With a remarkable career spanning more than 50 years, Fogerty will take fans on an electrifying journey through his CCR classics and the solo hits that solidified his status as one of the most influential musicians in history and whose music became the soundtrack of a generation. Buy tickets online or call show reservations at (702) 770-9966.

Title: Lyfe Jennings
Location: TGI Fridays 5111 Boulder Hwy Las Vegas, NV 89122
Description: Lyfe Jennings is a singer and songwriter, crafting emotional ballads with a unique sound that blurs the lines between R&B and folk music. The platinum-selling recording artist is also a multi-instrumentalist who plays guitar, bass, and piano. Critics have called Jennings a throwback to the R&B singers of the 1960's, including such legendary artist as Sam Cooke and Al Green, while his use of hip-hop beats and collaborations with rappers connects his music to contemporary developments in R&B. Some critics have even credited Jennings as a pioneer of a new genre; one that National Public Radio (NPR) host Corey Moore called "Folk Soul".Sale Dates and Times:Public Onsale : Fri, 3 Nov 2017 at 05:00 PM

Title: Rick Derringer
Location: Golden Nugget Hotel & Casino 129 Fremont Street Experience, Las Vegas, NV 89101 Las Vegas, NV 89101
Description: American rocker Rick Derringer was just 17 when his band The McCoys recorded the No.1 hit Hang On Sloopy in the summer of 1965, knocking Yesterday by The Beatles out of the top spot. Derringer later played and recorded with Johnny and Edgar Winters bands and Steely Dan, though he is probably best known for his 1974 solo hit Rock N Roll Hoochie Koo. After more than four decades, hes still going strong!Sale Dates and Times:Public Onsale : Fri, 6 Oct 2017 at 10:00 AMExclusive Internet Presale : Mon, 2 Oct 2017 at 10:00 AM
